io.hekate.messaging.broadcast

Class AggregateFuture<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<T>
      • io.hekate.util.HekateFuture<T,MessagingFuture<T>>
        • io.hekate.messaging.MessagingFuture<AggregateResult<T>>
          • io.hekate.messaging.broadcast.AggregateFuture<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Base type of aggregation results.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    CompletionStage<AggregateResult<T>>, Future<AggregateResult<T>>

    public class AggregateFuture<T>
extends MessagingFuture<AggregateResult<T>>
    Asynchronous result of aggregate(...) operation.
    See Also:
    MessagingChannel.aggregate(Object), AggregateResult

    • Method Detail

      • results

        public Collection<T> results()
                      throws InterruptedException,
                             MessagingFutureException
        Awaits for the asynchronous aggregation to complete and returns the AggregateResult.results() result}.
        Returns:
        Aggregation result.
        Throws:
        MessagingFutureException - Signals that aggregation failed.
        InterruptedException - Signals that the thread was interrupted while waiting for aggregation to complete.

      • results

        public Collection<T> results(long timeout,
                             TimeUnit unit)
                      throws InterruptedException,
                             MessagingFutureException,
                             TimeoutException
        Awaits for the asynchronous aggregation to complete within the timeout and returns the AggregateResult.results() result}.
        Parameters:
        timeout - Time to wait for operation result.
        unit - Time unit of the timeout argument
        Returns:
        Aggregation result.
        Throws:
        MessagingFutureException - Signals that aggregation failed.
        InterruptedException - Signals that the thread was interrupted while waiting for aggregation to complete.
        TimeoutException - Signals that timeout happened.

      • resultsUninterruptedly

        public Collection<T> resultsUninterruptedly()
                                     throws MessagingFutureException
        Uninterruptedly awaits for the asynchronous aggregation to complete and returns the AggregateResult.results() result}.
        Returns:
        Aggregation result.
        Throws:
        MessagingFutureException - Signals that aggregation failed.

      • forEach

        public void forEach(Consumer<? super T> action)
             throws InterruptedException,
                    MessagingFutureException
        Awaits for the asynchronous aggregation to complete and performs the given action for each element of the aggregation results.
        Parameters:
        action - The action to be performed for each result.
        Throws:
        MessagingFutureException - Signals that aggregation failed.
        InterruptedException - Signals that the thread was interrupted while waiting for aggregation to complete.
